p: The previously described protocol of MTT cytotoxicity assessment with slight modifications was used to investigate the viability of cells [ 42]. Cancer cells were grown to a density of 2 × 10 4 cells/well for 24 hours and then exposed to different test concentrations of AgNPs for 24 hours. After, PBS with added 5.0 mg/mL MTT was introduced at the rate of 10 μL into each well and incubated for another 4 hours. The introduction of MTT led to the formation of formazan crystals inside the live cells. DMSO (100 μL) was introduced for dissolving the formazan crystals, and the readings were taken at 570 nm using a microplate ELISA reader (BioTek).
